      • fitToPhysicalBounds

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static android.graphics.RectF fitToPhysicalBounds(@NotNull
                                                                              android.graphics.RectF bounds,
                                                                              @NotNull
                                                                              android.graphics.RectF physicalBounds)
        Parameters:
        bounds - bounds of the object in units (1/72 inches).
        physicalBounds - physical bounds of the document (in inches).
        Returns:
        bounds of the object converted to fit inside given physical bounds. Calculations are done taking into account that 1 unit is equals to 1/72 inches.

      • calculatePageBounds

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static android.graphics.RectF calculatePageBounds(@Nullable
                                                                              PDFPageSize pageSize,
                                                                              @NotNull
                                                                              android.graphics.Rect bounds,
                                                                              int rotation)

        Calculates page bounds by enum PDFPageSize and with specified rotation

        Parameters:
        pageSize - PDF page size
        bounds - source image bounds
        rotation - source image rotation
        Returns:
        RectF page bounds
        See Also:
        enum PDFPageSize
